Gerakan Ibu Sadar Gizi, Cegah Stunting Anak Sekaligus Obesitas Ibu
06 Nov 2019, 05:07 by Anik Hasanah


Gerakan Ibu Sadar Gizi, Cegah Stunting Anak Sekaligus Obesitas Ibu

KBRN, Surabaya : Salah satu upaya untuk menekan angka stunting (kondisi anak lebih pendek dari anak normal, red) adalah dengan meningkatkan keragaman makanan yang dikonsumsi oleh anak. Selain itu, ketahanan pangan memiliki hubungan dengan masalah gizi ganda di level keluarga. Yaitu ibu obesitas namun anak mengalami stunting.Untuk itu, Trias Mahmudiono S.KM., MPH (Nutr.), GCAS, Ph.D atau Trias, dosen Fakultas Kesehatan Masyarakat (FKM), bersama timnya melakukan penelitian terkait dengan efektifitas pendidikan gizi kepada ibu obesitas dengan anak stunting untuk menurunkan masalah gizi ganda di Indonesia, terutama pada level keluarga.Â "Mengingat, pada level keluarga yang dapat meningkatkan keragaman makanan adalah ibu selaku pengelola keuangan dan yang mendistribusikan makanan di rumah," ujarnya, Selasa (5/11/2019)."Intervensi yang kami lakukan tidak hanya memberikan informasi, tapi juga memberdayakan ibu agar sadar bahwa kebutuhan balita dari sisi gizi berbeda dengan kebutuhan orang dewasa," jelas Trias.Trias bersama tim memberikan pendampingan selama tiga bulan kepada 72 sasaran melalui kelas edukasi gizi setiap dua minggu sekali, pelatihan pembuatan makanan pendamping air susu ibu serta didampingi pemberian makanan hati ayam, telur dan ikan.Para ibu diberi informasi tentang jenis-jenis makanan yang dibutuhkan anak agar tidak mengalami stunting seperti makanan yang tinggi protein diantaranya ikan, telur dan hati ayam. Sementara untuk ibu yang mengalami obesitas perlu melakukan aktivitas fisik dan lebih banyak makan sayur dan buah atau makanan yang tinggi serat."Setelah diedukasi, kemudian diberi voucher dengan nominal tertentu yang hanya bisa ditukarkan pada penjual bahan pangan mitra kami," lanjutnya.Pemberian voucher tersebut untuk mengetahui apakah informasi yang diberikan benar benar diaplikasikan pada kehidupan sehari-hari.Kemudian, penjual mitra peneliti mendata bahan pangan apa saja yang dibeli ibu-ibu tersebut menggunakan voucher. Sehingga, tim peneliti mengetahui jenis bahan pangan apa saja yang ibu ibu tersebut beli."Disela-sela minggunya, kami juga melibatkan kader untuk melakukan kunjungan rumah pada kelompok target penelitian untuk memberikan motivasi dan monitoring," papar Trias.Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa setelah intervensi selama tiga bulan, tinggi badan anak relatif meningkat. Sehingga, intervensi berupa edukasi, pemberdayaan pembuatan makanan pendamping asi, dan didampingi dengan pemberian hati ayam, telur dan ikan cukup efektif untuk menurunkan angka stunting. (Ria)

Nutrition Conscious Mother Movement, Preventing Child Stunting and Mother Obesity
Nov 6, 2019, 05:07 by Anik Hasanah


Nutrition Conscious Mother Movement, Preventing Child Stunting and Mother Obesity

KBRN, Surabaya: One effort to reduce the number of stunting (the condition of children shorter than normal children, red) is to increase the diversity of food consumed by children. In addition, food security has a relationship with the problem of multiple nutrition at the family level. Namely obese mother but the child stunted. For that, Trias Mahmudiono S.KM., MPH (Nutr.), GCAS, Ph.D or Trias, lecturer at the Faculty of Public Health (FKM), together with his team conducted research related to the effectiveness of nutrition education to Obese mothers with stunting children to reduce the problem of multiple nutrition in Indonesia, especially at the family level. "Considering, at the family level that can increase food diversity is the mother as the financial manager and who distributes food at home," he said, Tuesday (11/05/2019). "The interventions we do not only provide information, but also empower mothers to aware that the nutritional needs of children under five are different from the needs of adults, "explained Trias. Trias and the team provided three months of mentoring to 72 targets through nutrition education classes every two weeks, training in making complementary breast milk and accompanied by providing chicken liver food. , eggs and fish. The mothers are given information about the types of food that children need to avoid stunting such as high-protein foods including fish, eggs and chicken liver. Meanwhile, obese mothers need to do physical activity and eat more vegetables and fruits or foods that are high in fiber. "After being educated, then given a voucher with a certain nominal that can only be exchanged with our partner food vendors," he continued. to find out whether the information provided is actually applied to daily life. Then, the research partner sellers record what ingredients the women buy using vouchers. Thus, the research team found out what kind of food the mothers bought. "During the week, we also involved cadres to conduct home visits to the target research groups to provide motivation and monitoring," said Trias. The results showed that after the intervention for three months, the child's height is relatively increased. Thus, interventions in the form of education, empowerment of making complementary foods, and accompanied by the provision of chicken livers, eggs and fish are effective enough to reduce stunting rates. (Ria)
